Generation III.Ruby: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all the Pok é mon . It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
Generation III.Sapphire: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this Pok é mon 's body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to restless spirits.
Generation III.Emerald: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all Pok é mon , it has been depicted in paintings and statues.
Generation III.FireRed: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.

Generation IV.Diamond: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.
Generation IV.Pearl: It is the world's most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic .
Generation IV.Platinum: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It's said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you're feeling.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It's said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you're feeling.

Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Milotic live at the bottom of large lakes. When this Pokémon's body glows a vivid pink, it releases a pulsing wave of energy that brings soothing calm to troubled hearts.

Generation VII.Sun: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
Generation VII.Moon: It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war, it shows itself, which soothes people's minds and hearts.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: While Milotic is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon, Trainers who like Feebas and have raised it are seemingly disappointed by Milotic.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its dwelling place is the bottom of big lakes. Those who behold its loveliness are said to have their hearts purified.
